ingredients: 2 cups plums, pitted and sliced, 1 tablespoon water (Optional), 1 (.25 ounce) package unflavored gelatin,   +   1/2 cup hot water (Optional),   +   1/2 cup white sugar, 2 tablespoons lemon juice,   +   1/2 cup evaporated milk
nutrition: Total Fat 2g 3%, Saturated Fat 1g 6%, Cholesterol 7mg 2%, Sodium 30mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 31g 11%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 29g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 10mg 48%, Calcium 72mg 6%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 188mg 4%
